name: A pair of polished adamantite sabatons
data: It increases the users strength noticably.
It increases the users wisdom noticably.
It has superb armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration slightly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
It increases the users physical resistance adequately.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
